name: Kaiju Clash
description:
TL;DR

Controls:

  1. Drag monster cards into the screen to play them.
  2. Select cells highlighted in yellow to attack. You can only attack once per-card and can only attack cities.
  3. After the attack, select cells highlighted in blue to move.
  4. M to mute score.

NOTE:

- In order to move after playing a card you must first attack a building or waste the attack by using the red "Waste attack" button at the bottom-right.

- Each monster has its own attack and movement patterns.

Kaijesus Christ!

You are a shapeshifting Warlock, using card magic to transform into monsters with the sole intent of destroying all the major cities of the world!

Your objective is to wipe out all the buildings in the grid by using your cards & mana carefully. Each card costs a chunk of mana and moving will use a little mana as well. If you run out, you won't be able to act anymore!

Use a card by dragging it into the screen to transform into a monster. This begins a "turn", divided into two phases:

  1. Attack Phase: Tiles that can be attacked will be highlighted in yellow. You can only attack cities. If there is nothing to attack or you choose not to, you can click on the red "Waste attack" button at the bottom-right. Either way, the next phase will begin.
  2. Movement Phase: Tiles that can be moved to will be highlighted in blue and an arrow will point to them when hovered over. Normal monsters can only move on land. Amphibious monsters can move on land or water. Flying monsters can fly over land, water or forest.
Each card has its own move set consisting of different attack & movement patterns, which are displayed at the bottom-right of the card in a little diagram:

yellow = current position

blue = tiles around current position where you can move

red = tiles around current position where you can attack
